Text:
Great torrent, thanks!
Songs are perfect, no virus.
Should seed (:

Actually I just noticed that at about 1:04 in Take It Slow it actually skips for a few seconds.
So far that's the only problem I've come across.
I'll let you know if I find any more.
@cassn i don't think it skips, it might just be the one time you were playing it because mine are fine, and i checked with adobe audition and there were no gaps of any sort.

Thanks, took me a while to get used to their new sound, but I still HATE Hawkbot. I love FTSK, can't wait for the rest of the Weekend. Also, if you rip the next EP, could you rip at 320? I'm a quality freak.
Good thnx!.... but NinnyBits is right hawkbot sucks
